title: LOUIS-- 820-00164 Partially Blown Fuse!????
message: I have a 820-00164 from another shop with no water damage, green light, but no power. PPBUS_G3H is at 1-2V so I imagine a short. Visual inspection and C7314 is destroyed. I replace it and still no power/fan and PPBUS_G3H is now 4.5V. After measuring around forever, I finally measure BOTH pins of F7140, pin 2 is at 4.5 and pin 1 is 8.6. I measure for continuity and there is none! Has anyone ran into a partially blown fuse before?? I still consider myself a novice-- Louis, I think I have seen all of your videos, but I have never heard of this??

title: LOUIS-- 820-00164 Partially Blown Fuse!????
message: You measure no continuity so the fuse is not partially dead it is dead dead. How some voltage leaks around it can be through any component.

title: LOUIS-- 820-00164 Partially Blown Fuse!????
message: See if there is a short to ground on the other side of the fuse. If there isn't, replace the fuse.
